prod_short_desc: Glide across and above the swamp with Destiny's Shadow!
prod_long_desc:
Fight the Vermillion for control of the Pause Time Blade with Lloyd and Cole aboard Destiny’s Shadow. This convertible boat/flyer features flip-out wings for flight mode, two stud shooters, plus two detachable canoes and two oars. Dial up the ninja vs. Vermillion conflict with Vermin’s V-shaped hoverboard and Vermillion axe. Includes three minifigures.
Build the Ninja’s swamp vehicle Destiny’s Shadow that both sails and flies, with stud shooters, flip out wings for flight mode, and two detachable canoes
Includes three minifigures, Lloyd, Cole, and Vermin plus two katana and Vermin’s vermillion axe
Destiny’s shadow measures over 3” high, 11” long and 3” wide in boat mode, and 9” wide in flight mode. Vermillion hoverboard measures over 2” long, 2” wide and under 1” high
LEGO NINJAGO building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Featured in the hit TV series LEGO NINJAGO: Masters of Spinjitzu.
360 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14 years old
